import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update view user response"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/users/{viewUserId}/response/{response}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Records a user's response to a view share invitation (Accepted, Declined, or NoResponse).

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewUserId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}/users](/docs/api/views/list-view-users) to list shares and extract `Items[].ViewUserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List user shares: [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}/users](/docs/api/views/list-view-users).
2. [POST /api/v1.0/views/users/\{viewUserId\}/response/\{response\}](/docs/api/views/update-view-user-response) to capture the response.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `viewUserId` (path), `response` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewUserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the view user share assignment.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"c5e177b6-9968-4f65-95cc-842ae2d63b57"},{"name":"response","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Response value to record for the share invitation.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["NoResponse","Accepted","Declined"]},"example":"Accepted"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
